column1: #Text=The tourist village of Mystic lies in the eastern part of Groton .
#Text=From either New Haven or Providence , take Interstate 95 to exit 30 , or U.S. Route 1 .
#Text=From Worcester , take Interstate 395 to CT Route 85 , to Interstate 95/U.S. Route 1 .
#Text=AMTRAK services southern Connecticut to New York and points south ; and Providence , Boston and points north .
#Text=Groton – New London Airport , 155 Tower Ave. , Phone : +1-860-445-8549.
#Text=U.S. Navy Submarine Force Museum , 1 Crystal Lake Rd , toll-free : +1-800-343-0079 .
#Text=World 's finest collection of submarine artifacts and home of the USS Nautilus , the first nuclear sub .
#Text=Traces development of subs from Revolutionary War times .
#Text=Admission , including self-guided tour of USS Nautilus , is free , but donations invited .
#Text=Koto Japanese Steak House , 527 Long Hill Road .
#Text=Although the name implies a steak house it is similar to Benihana in the Teppenyaki side of the house .
#Text=But , where the place really shines is their sushi .
#Text=The chef is a Japanese national who is very skilled and quite innovative at making sushi .
#Text=They regularly import fish from Japan and it is fantastic .
#Text=It rivals some of the best NY sushi restaurants and by far exceeds anything in the area .
#Text=Hampton Inn , Groton , 300 Long Hill Road , ☏ +1860 405-1585 , fax : +1860 446-8456 .
#Text=The Hampton Inn Groton hotel is a gateway to downtown Groton and minutes away from Mystic .
#Text=Easily accessible from I-95 North and South and centrally located near major businesses .

#Text=Features four stories with 80 rooms , including 4 king suites , a complimentary deluxe continental breakfast , indoor heated pool , meeting room for 65 people , exercise room and business center with complimentary high-speed internet and ATM .
#Text=Groton Inn & Suites , 99 Gold Star Highway , toll-free : +1-800-452-2191 .

#Text=Great for business travel since it is close to General Dynamics-Electric Boat Corporation , Dow Chemical , USS Submarine Base New London/Groton , Connecticut College , US Coast Guard Academy , Mitchell College , The Day Paper , Lawrence and Memorial Hospital , Sonalysts Studios Inc. and Pfizer .
#Text=Mystic Marriott Hotel and Spa , 625 North Road , ☏ +1860 446-2600 , toll-free : +1-866-449-7390 , fax : +1860 446-2601 .
#Text=Super 8 Motel Groton , 173 Route 12 , Groton , CT 06340 ( I-95 Exit 86 ) , ☏ +1860 448-2818 .
#Text=A cheap place to crash very near New London and just across the street from the Groton Inn and Suites .
#Text=The place is no nonsense and simple but it is clean and well maintained and an excellent bargain . ~$ 50 .
